full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG DRIL BU ZHABS LUGS KYI BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'KHOR LO SDOM PA'I LUS DKYIL GYI MNGON PAR RTOGS PA BDE CHEN RAB 'PHEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @052A *, ,(CES DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG GI LUS DKYIL LTA RE GNYIS PA'I SGRUB THABS DANG PHYI DKYIL LHA LNGA'I SGRUB THABS GNYIS KYI NGAG 'DON KHRIG CHAGS SU GO BDE BAR BSGRIGS PA BDE CHEN RAB 'PHEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, YUL BYANG PHYOGS KYI MTHAR 'KHYAMS PA'I BAN RGAN GYI NA PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN DPAL BZANG POS LUS DKYIL GYI SGRUB THABS RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS DGONGS PA RAB GSAL, RJE 'DUL BA 'DZIN PAS MDZAD PA'I DE'I LHAN THABS, DRIN CAN RTZA BA'I BLA MA KHYAB BDAG 'KHOR LO'I MGON PO DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN PAS MDZAD PA'I LUS DKYIL GYI SGRUB THABS GSUM @052B LA GZHI BYAS PA YIN CING, LHA LNGA'I SGRUB THABS RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA LA GZHI BYAS TE, SKU GSUM LAM 'KHYER SOGS SKYD RIM GYI DMIGS PA GAL CHE SHOS 'GA' ZHIG RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I, BDE MCHOG GI SKYED RIM 'DOD 'JO DANG, RJE DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I BDE MCHOG LUS DKYIL GYI BSKYED RIM SOGS NAS 'BYUNG BAS BRGYAN TE RANG GI BRJED BYANG DANG, SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN PO'I RGYAL KHYAB PA'I CING GI BONG CHOS LHA KHANG DU GRAGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD DANG, LDAN PA'I DGE TSUL DPAL BZANG PO, ,'DI LA BRTEN NAS KYANG RGYAL BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
